items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive, and accessible dark mode toggle. It supports localisation, right-to-left (RTL) languages, manual overrides, and adapts to user preferences and system settings while ensuring accessibility. Dark mode works even without JavaScript.
items.title: MacSteini/Dark-Mode-Toggle: A lightweight, responsive, and accessible dark mode toggle. It supports localisation, right-to-left (RTL) languages, manual overrides, and adapts to user preferences and system settings while ensuring accessibility. Dark mode works even without JavaScript.

items.content_html: A Telegram Mini App with a growing collection of tools like calculators, converters, and more. All tools are created using advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring smart and efficient functionality. Lightweight, user-friendly, and regularly updated to simplify everyday tasks directly within Telegram.
